Description: Glazed steatite scaraboid decorated on the back with a high relief representation of a standing monkey, with incised nefer hieroglyphs to right, longitudinally pierced, the base inscribed with hieroglyphs including name of Bastet, and decorated with a representation of a horse wearing a plumed headdress.
Curator's comments: Published: Andrews, Amulets of Ancient Egypt (1994): p.53
